item.title: GCP Professional Data Engineer Certification
item.author: andrewrgoss@gmail.com (Andrew Goss)
item.description: I am starting the process of becoming a Google Cloud Certified Professional Data Engineer. For exam prep, there are five recommended training courses to complete, which I am doing online through Coursera. Training Courses Google Cloud Platform Big Data and Machine Learning Fundamentals [IN PROGRESS]· My Notes and Lab Exercises Leveraging Unstructured Data with Cloud Dataproc on Google Cloud Platform Serverless Data Analysis with Google BigQuery and Cloud Dataflow Serverless Machine Learning with Tensorflow on Google Cloud Platform Building Resilient Streaming Systems on Google Cloud Platform Resources Google Cloud Platform Why Google Cloud Platform?
